SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SCHOLARSHIPS ARE PAID DIRECTLY TO THE MEMBERS FOR SPOUSES OR CHILDREN OF MEMBERS IN GOOD STANDING UPON APPROVAL OF APPLICATIONS BY LOCAL 40 SCHOLARSHIP TRUSTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE FORM 990 IS PREPARED BY OUTSIDE, INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANTS. UPON COMPLETION, IT IS REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE BOARD. ONCE COMPLETE AND ACCURATE, IT IS THEN REVIEWED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH YEAR, THE OFFICERS RECEIVE THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND MUST SIGN AN AFFIRMATION ACKNOWLEDGING RECEIPT OF THE SAME AND ACKNOWLEDGING THAT THEY HAVE READ THE POLICY AND AGREE TO COMPLY WITH THE POLICY.
